page.title: 14LAW/ORDER/SERVICES _ BORTH
page.content: {Police }The police station in Borth is no longer manned full_time. The area policemen have been centralised at the Divisional Police headquarters in Aberystwyth. The Borth station is now open from June 1st _ 30th September, on Tuesday mornings and Friday evenings. {Coastguard & R.N.L.I. }The coastguard and R.N.L.I. huts are next to one another. They help to co_ordinate search and rescue operations and the coastguard has the help of the radio to contact base and pick up messages from as far away as Fishguard or Snowdon. The lifeboat crew includes one of the few women members in Britain.It can be called out as often as four times on a busy summer day. {Firemen} Nearest station _ Aberystwyth {Ambulance }Bronglais Hospital, Aberystwyth.
